resource.name: Segal AmeriCorps Education Award: Detailed Payments by Institution 2019
columns_description: Name of the higher education institution college. (i.e. School of Law)
The total amount of Segal AmeriCorps Education Award and Interest payments made to the institution.

The type of payment. Education expenses; Repay qualified loans; Uncategorized; Returns. Returns (to CNCS from the Institution) may indicate canceled or returned payments made in error. Sum of payments grouped by this payment type should account for returned amounts (negative values) in order to build an accurate figure. Returns are not associated with either of the other payment types and must be inferred through the context of the payments to the institution by year.
Name of the higher education institution campus. (if available)
Name of the higher education system of schools. (May be incomplete or missing.)
Name of the higher education or loan processing institution.
The fiscal year in which the treasury payment was made to the institution.
The type of award earned by the AmeriCorps member; Interest, Education, or Other.
Name of the U.S. State or Territory. (INTL indicates international payment)

domain_metadata.value: (1) Includes all Segal AmeriCorps Education payment types, including interest payments. (2) Institution, System, Campus, College, and State are data values were reviewed and cleaned by CNCS staff to increase standardization. The cleaning process includes multiple types of changes including; adjusting abbreviations, fixing spelling errors, updating the name if ownership changed or as otherwise changed by the institution, or reflecting the name of the higher ed institution if payment was handled by a loan processing organization but the higher ed institution name was present in CNCS records associated with the payment, among other change types. (3) Changes are current as of August 2020 and are subject to change on further review. (4) Changes do not affect the CNCS system of record managed by the National Service Trust and are made for the purpose of easier public consumption of the data. (5) Systems, campus, and colleges may be incomplete or missing. If you believe a system should be added to the dataset or if another record is in error, please write to opendata@cns.gov with the current name and state of the institution and the recommended change. (6) Payments by payment type may be either positive or negative. The sum of all payments per institution will reflect the accurate total per the institution without further additional adjustments to the payment value. (7) Count of payments includes returned or canceled payments ($0). (8) Payment to eligible institutions is made on behalf of the AmeriCorps member or recipient of transferred awards at their request. AmeriCorps members must use their award within seven years of completing their term of service. Recipients of transferred awards must use the award within ten years from the date the education award was earned. (9) Repay loan payments are those made to qualified student loans. Qualified student loans is defined as a loan backed by the federal government under Title IV of the Higher Education Act (except PLUS Loans to parents of students) or under Titles VII or V

AmeriCorps Segal Education Award payment data is collected and maintained by the National Service Trust. Payment to eligible institutions is made on behalf of the AmeriCorps member or recipient of a transferred award at their request. AmeriCorps members must use their award within seven years of completing their term of service. Recipients of transferred awards must use the award within ten years from the date the education award was earned.

resource.name: State Profile Geospatial Data
resource.description: This dataset is used to produce the CNCS state profile map for use on our website.
